title: Bridges
description: Vehicle bridge within a given city

feature.title: Feature
feature.description: The location of a vehicle bridge

YearConstructed.description: The year the bridge was constructed

InstallDate.description: The fill date the bridge was installed

LifecycleStatus.description: The current status of the bridge as it relates to it's lifecycle eg. Active

FeatureCrossed.description: The name of the feature the bridge crosses

Location.description: The street number and name where the bridge is located eg. 2203 River Rd

BridgeType.description: The materials the bridge is made out of

Sidewalks.description: A short description of the sidewalks on the bridge or lack thereof

UtilitiesPresent.description: A short description of any utility lines, if any, are supported on the bridge

NumberOfLanes.description: The numbner of lanes on the bridge

PostedSpeedLimit.description: A short description of the speed limit on the bridge

SymbolAngle.description: The angle of the symbol of the bridge

RecordedLength.description: The recorded length of the bridge

AssetManager.description: The asset manager of the bridge

RoadUse.description: The type of road usage of the bridge eg. Arterial

Comments.description: A brief comment about the bridge

IsOneWay.descrpiton: Is the bridge a one way bridge eg true, false

PaintColor.description: The color the bridge was painted

TrafficType.description: The type of traffic that will cross the bridge

CreatedUser.description: The user that created this dataset

CreatedDate.description: The date this data was initially created

LastEditedUser.description: The name of the persron that last edited this date

LastEditedDate.description: The date this data was last edited

ShapeLength.description: The shape length of the bridge

ShapeArea.description: The area of the shape of the bridge
